entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this morning. High minus 21. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow and blowing snow beginning late this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the afternoon then clearing. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
